text: Charles August Lindbergh, Sr. (January 20, 1859 â€“ May 24, 1924), was a United States Congressman for 6th District of Minnesota from 1907 to 1917. Lindbergh was a member of the Republican Party. He was the father of Charles Lindbergh. ==References== * Larson, Bruce L. Lindbergh of Minnesota: A Political Biography. New York: Harcourt Brace Jovanovich, Inc., 1973. . title: Charles August Lindbergh
